item.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Free Bird
item.description:
Free Bird by Lynyrd Skynyrd. For educational use. The lyrics video was created by YouTuber Anna Mintz and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKLJdmR6UGU, I just added the ukulele chords. Chords Used: G, D, Em, F, C (and Bb, but only during the bridge / guitar solo).
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: McFly - All About You
item.description:
All About You by McFly. It’s been digitally lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G E7 C7 D7 Fm G+
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Rolling Stones - (I Can't Get No) Satisfaction
item.description:
Satisfaction (I Can’t Get No) by The Rolling Stones. It’s been digitally lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C F G
If you found this video useful please subscribe to my channel. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Youngbloods - Get Together
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G F C D
Get Together by The Youngbloods. It’s been digitally lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber “Chris' Lyrics” and I simply added the chords to their video.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Chuck Berry - Sweet Little Sixteen
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C
Chords Used: G7, C, F
As performed by Chuck Berry
Tutorial Video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/qvXLcSfORcU
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Steve Miller Band - Rock 'n' Me
item.description: Chords: F, C, B-flat See Riff Practice Video: https://youtu.be/o-CP4fPDI0o

item.title: Eagle-Eye Cherry - Save Tonight
item.description: Chords: Am, F, C, G Possible Strum: D- D- D- DU
